item.title: 美国车桥公司与道莱公司就跨大西洋汽车贸易进行谈判
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，传动系统零部件制造商美国车桥制造控股公司（American Axle & Manufacturing Holdings Inc.【原文：American Axle & Manufacturing Holdings Inc., a maker of drivetrain components, is in advanced talks to combine with UK peer Dowlais Group Plc in a transatlantic automotive deal, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 苹果公司与 SpaceX 合作在 iPhone 上支持 Starlink 卫星网络
item.description: 苹果公司一直在秘密与 SpaceX 和 T-Mobile US Inc. 合作，在其最新的 iPhone 软件中增加对 Starlink 网络的支持，为该公司内部的卫星通信服务提供一个替代方案。【原文：Apple Inc. has been secretly working with SpaceX and T-Mobile US Inc. to add support for the Starlink network in its latest iPhone software, providing an alternative to the company’s in-house satellite-communication service.】

item.title: 索尼任命财务总监户木宏树为下任首席执行官
item.description: 索尼集团公司将任命长期担任财务主管的户木宏树（Hiroki Totoki）为首席执行官，4 月 1 日起生效。【原文：Sony Group Corp. is appointing Hiroki Totoki, its longtime finance chief, as chief executive officer, effective April 1.】

item.title: 卢比暴跌，全球对印度债券的热情减退
item.description:
外国投资者正在失去对表现最好的新兴债券市场之一的兴趣

。【原文：

Foreign investors are losing interest in one of the best-performing emerging bond markets

】

item.title: 美国橄榄球联盟（NFL）允许前球员在 YouTube 上发布视频档案
item.description: 美国国家橄榄球联盟（National Football League）将允许前球员在自己的 YouTube 频道上使用其官方视频档案，帮助退役球员吸引球迷并创收。【原文：The National Football League will let former players tap its archive of official video footage on their YouTube channels, helping the retirees attract fans and generate income.】

item.title: 澳大利亚通胀缓解，为降息敞开大门
item.description: 澳大利亚 2024 年最后三个月的核心通胀率降幅超过预期，为最快于下月降息打开了大门，并导致货币走低。【原文：Australia’s core inflation eased by more than expected in the final three months of 2024, opening the door to an interest-rate cut as soon as next month and sending the currency lower.】

item.title: 日本新党提出 370 亿美元支持石破首相的预算案
item.description: 日本首相石破茂的目标是通过年度预算，而这或许关系到他自己的政治前途，因此他正在与两个中等规模的反对党展开一场耗资数十亿美元的选票争夺战。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba’s goal of getting the annual budget passed — and perhaps the fate of his own political future — is shaping up to be a multi-billion-dollar battle for votes from two mid-sized opposition parties.】

item.title: 特朗普发布行政命令后，美国的 TikTok 禁令有何变化？
item.description: 重返椭圆形办公室后，唐纳德-特朗普总统的第一项议程就是批准暂缓对 TikTok 执行死刑。【原文：Upon reentering the Oval Office, one of the first items on President Donald Trump’s agenda was to grant a stay of execution for TikTok.】

item.title: 监察机构称英国政府机构易受网络攻击影响
item.description: 一家监督机构发现，英国政府部门运行着数百套过时的计算机系统，而且未能实现自己的网络安全目标，从而增加了黑客攻击的破坏性风险。【原文：British government departments have operated hundreds of outdated computer systems and failed to meet their own cybersecurity targets, increasing the risk of a disruptive hack, a watchdog has found.】

item.title: 特朗普冻结资金法案一旦实施将面临冲击芯片法案的风险
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，特朗普政府下令冻结联邦资金的计划目前正受到联邦法官的阻挠。【原文：A federal funding freeze ordered by the Trump administration — currently blocked by a federal judge — could roil a $52 billion semiconductor subsidy program if it’s allowed to proceed, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Arm China 选出新首席执行官，在特朗普时代驾驭芯片地缘政治
item.description: Arm Holdings Plc 的中国合资公司正在任命一位本地芯片业资深人士担任新的首席执行官，以巩固领导层，更好地驾驭快节奏的地缘政治和技术变革。【原文：Arm Holdings Plc’s Chinese venture is appointing a local chip veteran to be its new chief executive officer, seeking to consolidate leadership to better navigate fast-paced geopolitical and technological shifts.】

item.title: 美联储将维持利率不变，并为特朗普做好准备
item.description: 预计美联储官员本周将保持利率稳定，从而有更多时间来降低通胀率，并评估唐纳德-特朗普总统的政策将如何影响经济。【原文：Federal Reserve officials are expected to leave interest rates steady this week, giving themselves more time to lower inflation and to assess how President Donald Trump’s policies will affect the economy.】

item.title: 千禧年聘请前谷歌总监主管印度技术事务
item.description: 据一位熟悉内情的人士透露，千禧管理公司已聘请 Jayaram Iyer 担任其印度技术主管。【原文：Millennium Management has hired Jayaram Iyer as its head of technology for India, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普的 Memecoin 现在可用来购买手表和运动鞋
item.description: 一些销售特朗普品牌产品的网站已经开始接受特朗普纪念币付款，以争取更多的总统支持者。【原文：Several websites selling Trump-branded products have started to accept the Trump memecoin for payment, in an effort to win over more of the president’s supporters.】

item.title: 科罗拉多军事基地将收容移民，移民及海关执法局加大打击力度
item.description: 科罗拉多州奥罗拉的一个美国军事基地将被用来处理和临时安置面临驱逐出境的移民，因为在唐纳德-特朗普总统的全面镇压下，移民和海关执法局（Immigration and Customs Enforcement）加强了突击检查。【原文：A US military base in Aurora, Colorado, will be used to process and temporarily house migrants facing deportation, as Immigration and Customs Enforcement steps up raids under President Donald Trump’s sweeping crackdown.】

item.title: 关税威胁占主导地位，石油保持两周来最大涨幅
item.description: 由于交易商权衡了唐纳德-特朗普总统计划对来自美国主要原油供应国加拿大和其他国家的进口商品征收关税可能对市场造成的影响，以及库存前景，石油价格在创下近两周最大涨幅后趋于稳定。【原文：Oil steadied after the biggest gain in almost two weeks as traders weighed the potential market fallout from President Donald Trump’s plan for tariffs on imports from major US crude supplier Canada and other countries, as well as the outlook for stockpiles.】

item.title: 威尔伯-罗斯称特朗普对征收关税 "非常认真
item.description: 前美国商务部长威尔伯-罗斯（Wilbur Ross）说，唐纳德-特朗普总统 "非常认真地 "考虑在其第二个任期内利用关税来迫使盟友让步，但他并不认为自己最终会采取一刀切的做法。【原文：Former US Commerce Secretary Wilbur Ross said President Donald Trump is “deadly serious” about using tariffs throughout his second term to squeeze concessions from allies, but doesn’t think he’ll ultimately take a blanket approach.】

item.title: 新西兰威利斯称预算案旨在释放经济增长活力
item.description: 新西兰财政部长尼古拉-威利斯（Nicola Willis）表示，今年的预算将寻求消除经济增长的障碍，她的目标是比目前预测的更早恢复盈余。【原文：New Zealand Finance Minister Nicola Willis said this year’s budget will seek to remove barriers to economic growth as she targets an earlier return to surplus than is currently forecast.】

item.title: 印度投资者在 6000 亿美元股票大跌后期待预算缓解
item.description: 印度投资者寄希望于联邦预算采取果断措施，以重振疲软的消费和恢复对印度股市的信心。【原文：Investors in India are banking on decisive measures from the federal budget to revive sluggish consumption and restore confidence in the nation’s stocks, which have shed more than $600 billion in value over the past month.】

item.title: DeepSeek 揭示能源行业发展多么需要人工智能
item.description: 管道网络和核电初创企业。得克萨斯州的土地所有者和燃料电池制造商。【原文：Pipeline networks and nuclear startups. Texas landowners and fuel-cell makers.】

item.title: 亚洲股市追随华尔街科技股反弹：市场综述
item.description: 美联储利率决议和美国大盘股财报将成为市场关注的焦点，亚洲股市有望追随华尔街科技股的反弹走势。【原文：Stocks in Asia are poised to follow a tech-led rebound on Wall Street in the wake of a selloff that shook global markets as focus turns to the Federal Reserve’s rate decision and US mega-cap earnings.】

item.title: 白宫人工智能沙皇萨克斯称 DeepSeek 依赖 OpenAI 模型
item.description: 白宫人工智能沙皇戴维-萨克斯（David Sacks）说，有 "大量证据 "表明，中国后起之秀 DeepSeek 利用 OpenAI 模型的输出结果来帮助开发自己的技术。【原文：White House artificial intelligence czar David Sacks said there’s “substantial evidence” that Chinese upstart DeepSeek leaned on the output of OpenAI’s models to help develop its own technology.】

item.title: 挪威 1.8 万亿美元基金 2024 年底前十名均为科技重镇
item.description: 挪威 1.8 万亿美元的财富基金在 2024 年年末的前十名中科技股占了很大比重，而中国初创公司 DeepSeek 开发的人工智能模型的成功也引发了人工智能驱动的股票涨势出现回调的担忧。【原文：Norway’s $1.8 trillion wealth fund ended 2024 with a tech-heavy top ten, just as the success of the artificial intelligence model developed by Chinese startup DeepSeek raises the specter of a correction in the AI-driven stock rally.】

item.title: 斯科特-贝森特宣誓就任第 79 任美国财政部长
item.description: 斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周二宣誓就任财政部长，成为对唐纳德-特朗普总统的全面经济议程最为关键的政府机构之一的掌舵人。【原文：Scott Bessent was sworn in as Treasury Secretary on Tuesday, taking the helm of one of the government agencies most critical to President Donald Trump’s sweeping economic agenda.】

item.title: 丘博预计本季度洛杉矶野火将造成 15 亿美元损失
item.description: 据 Chubb Ltd 估计，本月初肆虐洛杉矶大片地区的野火将在第一季度给保险公司造成 15 亿美元的损失。【原文：Chubb Ltd estimates that the wildfires that ravaged swaths of Los Angeles earlier this month will cost the insurer $1.5 billion in the first quarter.】

item.title: 史蒂夫-科恩称 DeepSeek 是 "看好 "人工智能主题的发展
item.description: 本周伊始，受人工智能支出问题的影响，美国股市一路下跌，但这丝毫没有动摇史蒂夫-科恩对人工智能技术变革潜力的信心。【原文：The rout in US stocks to start the week, spurred by questions over artificial-intelligence spending, has done little to shake Steve Cohen’s confidence in the technology’s transformative potential.】

item.title: 华为无谷歌手机正在取得真正进展
item.description:
新的 HarmonyOS 软件对于中国的科技冠军来说至关重要。【原文：

New HarmonyOS software is of existential importance to China’s tech champion.

】

item.title: 特朗普的关税政策曾经打击过美国经济增长，并有可能再次打击美国经济增长
item.description:
最新公布的美联储会议记录显示，决策者为保持经济增长而争分夺秒。【原文：

Newly released transcripts from the Federal Reserve show just how much policymakers were scrambling to keep growth intact.

】

item.title: DeepSeek 的崛起引发了人工智能世界的焦虑和希望
item.description:
这家中国公司可能会以意想不到的方式颠覆竞争格局。【原文：

The Chinese company could upend the competitive landscape in unexpected ways. 

】

item.title: 美联储决议前，对国债大幅反弹的押注正蓬勃发展
item.description: 在美联储周三做出利率决定之前，债券交易员们加大了对美国国债的看涨押注，希望美联储主席鲍威尔能发出信号，表示3月份降息是板上钉钉的事。【原文：Bond traders are ratcheting up bullish bets on US Treasuries before the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate decision Wednesday in hopes that Chair Jerome Powell signals a cut in March is firmly on the table.】
